EnrollResult.CONSENTTOSHAREDATA: Does the patient consent to share their data with the requestor? (YES=1,NO=0)
EnrollResult.TERMSACCEPTED: Does the patient accept the Hixny PHR terms? (YES=1,NO=0)

TermsString.h2: Hixny Secure Patient Portal Patient Participation Agreement
TermsString.p: This Patient Participation Agreement is between you and Healthcare Information XChange of New York, Inc., doing business as Hixny ("Hixny"). This Patient Participation Agreement applies to the Hixny Secure Patient Portal located at https://patient.hixny.com/portal/HSPortal.Public.UI.Home.zen, which is referred to herein as the "Portal" or "Hixny Secure Patient Portal."

By signing this Patient Participation Agreement, you hereby agree to the terms and conditions set forth below regarding your usage of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. Hixny is a Health Regional Health Information Organization ("RHIO") comprised of a diverse group of health care organizations including hospitals, physician practices, health plans, and health care associations. A RHIO is a non-governmental, not-for-profit corporation enabling interoperable health information exchange between health care providers and systems. By using the Hixny Secure Patient Portal, you will have the opportunity to view, download and transmit certain Patient Data from your health care providers that are Participants. You may also have the opportunity to contribute your own Patient Data to the HIE, if Hixny determines (in its sole discretion) to offer such functionality.
TermsString.h3: Your Responsibilities: What You Must Do
TermsString.p: When using the Hixny Secure Patient Portal, you agree to do the following:

ul.li: Keep your Hixny Secure Patient Portal user name and password confidential;
Do not allow others to use your user name and password to access any data or records on the Hixny Secure Patient Portal;
Comply with the law as applicable;
Comply with any notices provided by Hixny related to use of the Portal;
Promptly notify Hixny if you learn of a security breach related to the Hixny Secure Patient Portal; and
Promptly notify Hixny if you are mistakenly given access to someone else's Patient Data.

TermsString.h3: Your Responsibilities: What You May Not Do
TermsString.p: When using the Hixny Secure Patient Portal, you may not:

ul.li: Use the Portal in a way that harms Hixny, any Hixny Participant, and/or vendors (collectively, the "Hixny parties");
Use any portion of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal as a destination linked from any unsolicited bulk messages or unsolicited commercial messages ("spam");
Modify or reroute, or attempt to modify or reroute, the Hixny Secure Patient Portal;
Damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Hixny Secure Patient Portal (or the network(s) connected to the Portal) or interfere with anyone's use and enjoyment of the Portal; or
Resell or redistribute the Portal, or any part of the Portal.

TermsString.p: By signing this Patient Participation Agreement, you understand that you may only be able to view, download and transmit a subset or portion of your Patient Data that is available on the HIE, as determined by Hixny in its sole discretion. The Hixny Policies and Procedures will specify which data categories are accessible to Patients through the Hixny Secure Patient Portal.
You understand that you may only view, download and transmit any Patient Data available via the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. You will not be able to edit or change any such Patient Data.
TermsString.h3: Privacy Related to Use of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal
TermsString.p: Hixny considers your use of the Portal to be private. However, Hixny may access or disclose information about you, your use of the Portal and/or the content of your communications, in order to:

ul.li: Comply with the law or legal process served on Hixny;

Enforce and investigate potential violations of this Patient Participation Agreement, including use of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal to participate in, or facilitate, activities that violate the law; or
Protect the rights, property, or safety of Hixny, its employees, the Hixny Participants or the public.

TermsString.p: In addition, Hixny may access or disclose your Patient Data, whether contributed by you or a Hixny Participant, in accordance with the Hixny Policies and Procedures.
You consent to the access and disclosures outlined in this section.

You understand that Federal and New York State Law allows Hixny Participants, in certain instances, to deny a request made by you to access your medical records. Accordingly, a Hixny Participant may notify Hixny that you should be denied access to data contributed by such Participant and Hixny will use reasonable efforts to block your access. If access is denied, the Hixny Participant shall notify you of the reason for such denial and provide information as to how you may request a review of such denial. You agree that Hixny has no liability for complying with such a request to block your access to Patient Data.
TermsString.h3: Changes To The Hixny Secure Patient Portal
TermsString.p: Hixny may change the Portal or delete features at any time and for any reason. Hixny may cancel or suspend your use of the Portal at any time. Such cancellation or suspension may be without cause and/or without notice. Upon cancellation, your right to use the Portal stops right away.
TermsString.h3: Changes To The Patient Participation Agreement
TermsString.p: Hixny may change this Patient Participation Agreement at its discretion by posting new applicable terms and conditions on the Hixny Secure Patient Portal website. If you do not agree to the changes, then you must stop using the Portal. If you do not stop using the Portal, then your use of the Portal will continue under the changed Patient Participation Agreement.

You understand that you may have the ability to upload your own Patient Data to the HIE, as determined by Hixny in its sole discretion. If Hixny offers this option and you choose to do this, you understand that your Patient Data will be accessible by any Participant who you have given consent to access your Patient Data via the HIE by having executed the Hixny Patient Consent Form. Such consent applies even if you executed the Hixny Patient Consent Form prior to this Patient Participation Agreement.

You further understand that, if you have provided consent to a particular Participant, such Participant will have access to any and all Patient Data you upload to the HIE, including the following Sensitive Information: HIV-related information, mental health information, genetic testing information, sexually transmitted disease and reproductive health information, including abortion information, and alcohol and substance abuse treatment information. By executing this Agreement, you understand that Hixny cannot, and has no obligation to, block or filter Sensitive Information from any Participant for whom you have given consent.

If you wish to deny a Participant access to Patient Data that you are uploading to the HIE, you must revoke any prior consents given to such Participant. See Hixny Secure Patient Portal Access and Use Policy for Patient-Contributed Data, for more information.
TermsString.h3: Seek Medical Advice from Your Physician
TermsString.p: The Hixny Secure Patient Portal does not provide medical or any other health care advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition, diet, fitness or wellness program. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of information you accessed on or through the Hixny Secure Patient Portal.

Hixny provides the Hixny Secure Patient Portal "as is," "with all faults" and "as available". Hixny does not guarantee the accuracy or timeliness of information available from the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. Hixny gives no express warranties, guarantees or conditions. You may have additional consumer rights under your local laws that this Patient Participation Agreement cannot change. Hixny excludes any implied warranties including those of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, workmanlike effort and non-infringement.

You may recover from Hixny only direct damages up to an amount you pay Hixny for usage of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. You cannot recover any other damages, including consequential, lost profits, special, indirect, incidental or punitive damages. This limitation applies to anything related to your usage of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal, including but not limited to:

ul.li: The Hixny Secure Patient Portal;
Viruses or other disabling features that affect your access to or use of the Portal;
Incompatibility between the Portal and other services, software and hardware;
Delays or failures you may have in initiating, conducting or completing any transmissions or transactions in connection with the Portal in an accurate or timely manner;
Misdirected Patient Data; and
Claims for breach of this Patient Participation Agreement, breach of warranty, guarantee or condition, strict liability, negligence, or other tort.

TermsString.p: It also applies even if (i) this remedy does not fully compensate you for any losses, or fails of its essential purpose; or (ii) Hixny knew or should have known about the possibility of the damages.

Any claim related to this Patient Participation Agreement or the Hixny Secure Patient Portal may not be brought unless brought within one year. The one-year period begins on the date when the claim first could be filed. If it is not filed, then that claim is permanently barred. This applies to you and your successors. It also applies to Hixny and our successors and assigns. You may notify us by contacting support@hixny.org.

All parts of this Patient Participation Agreement apply to the maximum extent permitted by law. A court may hold that Hixny cannot enforce a part of this Patient Participation Agreement as written. If this happens, then you and Hixny will replace that part with terms that most closely match the intent of the part that Hixny cannot enforce. The rest of this Patient Participation Agreement will not change. This Patient Participation Agreement and the Hixny Policies and Procedures is the entire agreement between you and Hixny regarding your use of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. It supersedes any prior Patient Participation Agreement or statements regarding your use of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. If you have confidentiality obligations related to the Hixny Secure Patient Portal, those obligations remain in force. The section titles in this Patient Participation Agreement do not limit the other terms of this Patient Participation Agreement. Any capitalized terms not defined in this Patient Participation Agreement are defined in the Hixny Policies and Procedures.

Hixny may assign this Patient Participation Agreement, in whole or in part, at any time with or without notice to you. You may not transfer to anyone else, either temporarily or permanently, any rights to use the Hixny Secure Patient Portal or any part of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal. This Patient Participation Agreement is solely for your benefit and Hixny's. It is not for the benefit of any other person.
TermsString.h3: Patient Participation Agreement Parties, Choice of Law and Location for Resolving Disputes
TermsString.p: This Patient Participation Agreement is between you and Hixny. New York State law governs the interpretation of this Patient Participation Agreement, regardless of conflict of laws or principles. You and Hixny irrevocably consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the state or federal courts in Albany County, New York, for all disputes arising out of or relating to this Patient Participation Agreement.

This Patient Participation Agreement is in electronic form. There may be information regarding the Hixny Secure Patient Portal that the law requires us to send you. Hixny may send you this information in electronic form. Hixny may provide required information to you:

ul.li: Via e-mail at the e-mail address you specified when you signed up for your usage of the Hixny Secure Patient Portal; or
Via the Portal login screen; or
Via access to a Hixny public webpage that will be generally designated in advance for this purpose.

TermsString.p: Notices provided to you via e-mail will be deemed given and received on the transmission date of the e-mail. As long as you can access and use the Hixny Secure Patient Portal, you have the necessary software and hardware to receive these notices. If you do not consent to receive any notices electronically, you must stop using the Hixny Secure Patient Portal.
TermsString.h3: Acceptance Of This Agreement By Hixny
TermsString.p: After you have accepted the terms and conditions of this Patient Participation Agreement, Hixny will send notice if it has accepted you as an "Hixny Secure Patient Portal User", meaning you are authorized to use the Portal. Hixny reserves the right to accept or deny an individual as an Authorized User, as determined by Hixny in its sole discretion.

Hixny may terminate this Hixny Secure Patient Portal Agreement at any time, without notice. You may also terminate this Patient Participation Agreement at any time by providing written notice to Hixny, whereby such termination shall be effective as of five (5) days after notice is received by Hixny.

Upon termination by you or Hixny for any reason, Hixny will either return any Patient Data contributed by you or destroy such Patient Data if impossible to return. Notwithstanding the foregoing, you understand and agree that Hixny cannot return or destroy Patient Data contributed by you that has been accessed by any Participants.
I hereby acknowledge that I have read the foregoing Patient Participation Agreement for the Hixny Secure Patient Portal and agree to its terms and conditions.
